channel.title: Neal Ford on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Neal Ford on Mark Needham

item.title: The Productive Programmer: Book Review
item.description: The Book The Productive Programmer by Neal Ford The Review I first came across this book when I was browsing Andy Hunt’s Pragmatic Thinking and Learning: Refactor Your Wetware on Amazon. It showed up as one of the related books. I had expected it to be a more theoretical book than it actually is. It is full of really useful command line tips and ways to use system tools and IDEs more effectively.
